about_the_game:
If you ever loved the GB version of Pokémon, Nobunyaga's Ambition, Sangokushi Taisen, or Onimusha Soul, then you definitely can't miss this game!

The game adopts the classic Pokémon top-down pixel style with four-directional movement, offering a nostalgic gameplay experience. The hero training system is inspired by Nobunyaga's Ambition, featuring five-stage leveling, skill inheritance, and enhancement mechanisms. The battle system focuses on the dual-city siege combat of Sangokushi Taisen, with the addition of ultimate skill triggers to make every battle unpredictable. Meanwhile, Onimusha Soul's high degree of freedom in city building and resource management provides players with limitless creative possibilities. As the game evolves with the times, although some elements may differ, the essence and core excitement of these classics remain faithfully preserved.

In this world that blends the Three Kingdoms and Sengoku eras, recruit your loyal companions, build an unbeatable faction, and rise to become a legendary ruler!

Game content

Recruit your favorite heroes

Build your own territory

Organize your own team

Conquer cities in other territories

Get more resources and explore more of this world.
